title: Ancient Enmity (1U29)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Skirmish: Make an Elf strength +1. If a minion loses this skirmish to that Elf, that minion's owner discards 2 cards at random from hand.
Lore:	Hard and bitter is the Elven hatred of Orcs, for they have lost many kinsmen to Orc savagery.
Rarity:	U
